name: StudioFACA Security
author: StudioFACA

sections.description:
Powerful plugin to protect your WordPress against unauthorized users.

Features:

  • Protect against Brute Force
  • Allow/Deny IP addresses
  • Allow/Deny Country
  • Block User agent
  • Block out any SQL injection
  • Block out any script trying to set a mosConfig value throught the URL
  • Block out any script trying to base64_encode_crap to send via URL
  • Block out any script trying to set a PHP GLOBALS variable via URL
  • Block out any script trying to modify a REQUEST variable via URL
  • Block Proxy

Remove plugin

  1. Deactive plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  2. Delete plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activete the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Setup
sections.faq:
Why is this plugin more powerful as others?

It is build to give maximum performance and high security.

Why I shoud use plugin?

You shout use this plugin to protect your WordPress against unauthorized users.

How can i support?

You can send a small donation.

How can I access If i get lock out?

You can manual remove rules by edit .htaccess file in WordPress root directory where you need modify or remove rule between tags “StudioFACA Security”.

How can I use this plugin?

You can use plugin at your own risk.
sections.changelog:
0.2 (17.08.2014)

  • Tested on Multi Site WordPress
  • Support for mod_geoip
  • Bug fixed

0.1 (10.08.2014)

  • first version
